DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether rESWT ( radial extracorporeal shock wave therapy ) combine supervised exercise improve function reduce pain subacromial shoulder pain compare supervised exercise alone .
DOC.brief_title: Radial Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy ( rESWT ) Treatment Subacromial Shoulder Pain
DOC.criteria: Dysfunction pain abduction Pain one two isometric test ( abduction external rotation ) Positive Hawkins sign Normal passive glenohumeral range motion Previous surgery affect shoulder Instability Total rupture rotator cuff ( evaluate clinically US ) Clinical sign cervical syndrome Infection area Exclusion criterion cont . Patients consider unable fill questionnaire go treatment Use anticoagulant drug bleed disorder Pregnancy Previous experience one study intervention Corticosteroid injection past 6 week . SPADI < 20
